articles.author: LEANDRA BERNSTEIN | Sinclair Broadcast Group
articles.title: What to know about mixing and matching vaccines - WCTI12.com
articles.description: Millions of Americans who are now eligible for COVID-19 booster shots are wondering whether they should stick with the same vaccine or switch to a different shot after U. S. regulators approved mixing and matching.  Mixed messages from public health agencies …

articles.title: Pluto Landmarks Named for Aviation Pioneers Ride and Coleman - NASA
articles.description: More than 60 years after Bessie Coleman broke the bonds of terra firma to become the first African American woman and Native American to earn a pilot’s license, Sally Ride blasted off aboard shuttle Challenger to become the first American woman in space.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: 'Captain America' protester convicted under Hong Kong national security law - The Star Online
articles.description: HONG KONG (Reuters): A Hong Kong activist dubbed "Captain America 2.0" for wielding the superhero's shield during protests was found guilty of incitement to secession on Monday (Oct 25), the second person convicted under a China-imposed national security law …
